title: National debt in the US in relation to gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2024
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: In general National debt in relation to GDP has rose over the Year.
National debt in relation to GDP is roughly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, and finally gradually increasing from 2017 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2021 and 2022.
The highest National debt in relation to GDP, of value 115.77 was reached at Year 2024
Minimum National debt in relation to GDP about 104.26 was reached at Year 2018
min_summary: Overall National debt in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.
